title: Inheritance
description: Darcy has a ten-thousand-year-old secret buried in her genetic code.  As a second year medical student, her life revolves around classes, studying, and her boyfriend Adam—until she treks through the desert, touches some mysterious stacked stones, and a network of glowing blue lines radiates under her skin.  Then she saw the spaceship. And it was coming for her.  She faces impossibly bad choices and a missing boyfriend.  Darcy struggles to accept her heritage and master her newfound powers as she navigates deception, betrayal, and danger in order to prevail in the galaxy’s most dangerous game—and survive to save Adam.  This new series also takes place in the Confluence Universe.This book was previously titled The Druid Gene.
author: Jennifer Foehner Wells
